Return Heatmap column order

Source: R/jamenrich-utils.R
heatmap_column_order.Rd

Return Heatmap column order as a list of character vectors

heatmap_column_order(hm)

Details

This function is a helpful utility to return the fully qualified list of colnames in a ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap object.

See also

Other jam utility functions: apply_color_cap(), avg_angles(), avg_colors_by_list(), collapse_mem_clusters(), enrichList2geneHitList(), find_colname(), gsubs(), handle_igraph_param_list(), heatmap_row_order(), isColorBlank(), mem_find_overlap(), order_colors(), rank_mem_clusters(), rotate_coordinates(), sort_colors(), subgraph_jam(), xyAngle()
